title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Professional Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can design PBL problems applicable to professional settings based on the 3C3R model.
Learners can develop three or more open-ended problem scenarios utilizing advanced domain knowledge.
Learners can validate the feasibility and validity of problem designs through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
